short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save articles, videos, & podcasts. Highlight insights. Organize your library of knowledge and never lose a valuable reference again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your read-it-later app into an eternal archive. Save articles, PDFs, podcasts, videos, and books with ease.

Galaxy Brain creates a secure copy of each source, ensuring your library is safe even if the original disappears. Instantly search your library with transcriptions and indexed content, highlight key insights, and seamlessly export them to your favorite note-taking apps.
